tab1.text1:
<TextStyle.Orange>Please Join the Discord to submit suggestions, ask questions, or challenge your enemies...</>

<TextStyle.Yellow>Last Wipe: December 10th, 2023</>
<TextStyle.Yellow>Next Wipe: TBD</>

tab2.text1:
<TextStyle.Orange>Join Discord to view the full list of rules! For now, here are a few basics...</>

<TextStyle.Yellow>No Exploits</>

<TextStyle.Yellow>No Cheats</>

<TextStyle.Yellow>No Human or Bob names</>

<TextStyle.Yellow>No Unnecessary Spam</>

<TextStyle.Yellow>No Causing Lag</>

tab3.text1:
<TextStyle.Orange>Donations are greatly appreciated and help keep the servers online.</>

<TextStyle.Orange>Available donation methods include:</>

<TextStyle.Yellow>CashApp</>
<TextStyle.Yellow>Venmo</>
<TextStyle.Yellow>PayPal</>
<TextStyle.Yellow>Zelle</>
<TextStyle.Yellow>Or, Nitrado 'Boost' code</>

<TextStyle.Green>THIS SERVER'S BOOST CODE IS: ky4xr9gs</>

<TextStyle.Orange>Please Join Discord to view the admin store and donation info. Open a ticket to let the admins know what you'd like.</>
